page.title: 02A day in the life of Lucy
page.content: Most mornings I get up at 7.30.I have breakfast at 8.00 with my mum and brother then my mum takes my brother to school,and I go and practise on my piano for 15 minutes.By that time my mum has come back and my friend Helen is waiting for me.I grab my bag,say goodbye and get on my bike.We go through the old school yard.When we arrive we put our bikes away and wait till the bell goes.When we are in class we have assembly and then maths up to playtime.At 12.00 we have lunch.Then in the afternoon we do art or English.At playtime we play cricket.Then at 3.30 we go home.When I get home I either read or play with Helen.At 6.00 I have my supper then I watch the television.Between 9.00 and 9.15 I go to bed then I read till 10.00.
